To reproduce:

feature and site wizard (contains one plugin and one feature). Now I put it
into a folder that contains also the Eclipse SDK and

leif@seneca ~/temp/testdigest $ tar xfz eclipse-SDK-I20060620-1010-linux-gtk.tar.gz
leif@seneca ~/temp/testdigest $ tar xfz s.tar.gz
leif@seneca ~/temp/testdigest $ java -jar eclipse/startup.jar -data ./workspace -application org.eclipse.update.core.siteOptimizer -digestBuilder -digestOutputDir=. -siteXML=s/site.xml s
leif@seneca ~/temp/testdigest $ cat ./workspace/.metadata/.log
